about_the_game:
Dive into the hilarious and captivating world of Baguettes Wars, the ultimate clash game set in the iconic streets of Paris. Choose your side as either the yellow vests or the riot police and engage in epic battles, all presented in a unique cartoon style that brings fun and humor to each encounter.

Introduction


Baguettes Wars is a solo game that allows you to pick your side in a satirical and entertaining conflict. With its cartoon graphics, this game adds a new dimension to urban skirmishes, immersing you in fights that are both intense and amusing.

Key Features


Engaging Story: Explore a unique and original narrative that keeps you hooked through 40 different levels, each offering its own surprises and challenges.
Varied Combat: Use a wide range of weapons to fight your opponents and master different strategies for each side.
Timer and Leaderboard: Test your skills and try to beat your own records or those of your friends with the integrated timer and leaderboard system.
Cartoon Graphics: Enjoy vibrant and fun visual style that makes every battle unique and memorable.
Diverse Environments: Traverse the streets of Paris, reimagined in a colorful and eccentric universe, paying homage to this iconic city while adding a touch of fantasy.

name: Baguette Wars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: MSI Gaming GeForce GT 710 2GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Not required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Ti avec 4 Go
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Not required

short_description: Dive into the hilarious and intense clashes of Baguettes Wars in Paris, with 40 captivating levels, a unique cartoon style, and a leaderboard to challenge your friends!
